JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description: Software Engineer responsible for software design/development/ integration/testing of embedded software for various automotive/non-automotive products by adhering to software development process.     Qualification: BE/B Tech/ME/M Tech/MS in E&CE/EE/CSE/IE     Programming Language: Embedded C / C++      Experience: 2 to 5 years of relevant experience in embedded software development industry (Vehicle communication and Diagnostics for Automotive industry is preferred)
FUNCTIONAL AREA: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design
